task.title: Moving Windows systems to this ZenPack

step.cmd: In the left column, select the /Server/Windows/WMI device class.
In the device list, select a Windows system to remove from the class.
From the bottom of the left column, click the Action button, and then select Delete Device....
In the Delete Device dialog, click SUBMIT.

taskbody.postreq: Add the deleted Windows device to the /Server/Microsoft/Windows class. For more information, see .
